title: Creamy chicken curry
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1kg skinless chicken breast fillets, cut into cubes', '1 1/2 tablespoons tandoori paste', '3 tablespoons tomato puree', '1 (410g) tin evaporated milk', '2 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '2 teaspoons cornflour', '2 tablespoons toasted flaked almonds', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', 'vegetables to serve', 'rice to serve']
